snippet: Ten of the protesters in Oregon who were arrested this week appeared before a federal magistrate in Portland. The judge ordered the Bundy brothers and three others to remain in custody; two others will be released once the occupation ends; and the judge delayed decisions on three.
lead_paragraph: Ten of the protesters in Oregon who were arrested this week appeared before a federal magistrate in Portland. The judge ordered the Bundy brothers and three others to remain in custody; two others will be released once the occupation ends; and the judge delayed decisions on three.

headline.main: Prosecutors Recommend Keeping Oregon Protesters in Custody
